attributes.action: KEEP THE STORAGE FACILITIES AT...The Original Felixstowe Sunday Market Sea Rd/Micklegate Rd.
attributes.additional_details: We are currently at the appeal stage after a complaint received saying the containers were detrimental to the eye and offensive to visitors to our town...we as in the Trasders desperatly need to keep the containers on The Sunday Market established 1982…loss of storage facilities, would mean loss of business for many traders and a much smaller market for our town creating less of a tourist attraction...please show your support by signing our online petition. Many thanks and extended gratititude for your support.
